column4: can anyone tell me how can i download build-essentials and install build-essentials from a folder?
yeah ubuntu is installed but i m using windows at the moment cause internet doesnt work.
wanna swtich to ubuntu and still figering out stuff
how do you connect to the net?
i use local area network to connect to internet.
you use a modem to connect, or are you on DSL?
how does your windows computer connect to the dsl connection? The modem is connected to the windows machine?
so, just so I understand you -- your windows machine connects to another machine using the lan cable, and then you use software on your windows machine to authenticate and get online?
just setup internet connection sharing on your windows machine, and connect the windows machine to the ubuntu machine.
well what if i just wanna use internet on ubuntu?
depends on the software that you are using to authenticate.  Its a strange setup you have there.
you need to see this 19:58 < Guv> Server Type: PPP
